faqs.question: What is Machine Learning (ML) and Natural Language Processing (NLP)?
faqs.answer: Machine Learning is a subset of artificial intelligence (AI) that focuses on the development of algorithms and statistical models that enable computers to perform tasks without explicit programming.

faqs.question: Who is this ML & NLP course for?
faqs.answer: This ML & NLP course is designed for aspiring data scientists, AI engineers, software developers, and anyone interested in leveraging machine learning and NLP techniques to solve real-world problems.

faqs.question: Is there any certification offered upon completion of the course?
faqs.answer: Yes, upon successful completion, you will receive a certification recognizing your proficiency in ML and NLP.

tabs.title: Why ML & NPL
tabs.content: Learning Machine Learning (ML) and Natural Language Processing (NLP) opens up a world of opportunities in today's data-driven and AI-powered landscape. ML enables computers to learn from data and make predictions or decisions without being explicitly programmed, while NLP focuses on enabling computers to understand, interpret, and generate human language. Together, they are transforming industries by automating tasks, extracting insights from large datasets, and enhancing user experiences. Proficiency in ML and NLP equips individuals with sought-after skills for roles in data science, AI engineering, research, and more, making it a valuable investment in one's career.
